chat.title: Login initialization
chat.content: Initializes and displays the chat widget only after the user has logged in.

chat.title: Dashboard display
chat.content: Display the dashboard in place of the chat area during initialization.

chat.title: Disable dashboard
chat.content: Disables the dashboard and restricts the user to only one conversation at a time.

chat.title: Allow Only One Conversation
chat.content: Restrict each user to a single conversation at a time.

chat.title: Hide Chat Outside of Office Hours
chat.content: Disable and hide the chat widget when it’s outside of the scheduled office hours.

chat.title: Hide Chat if No Agents Online
chat.content: Disable and hide the chat widget when no agents are online.

chat.title: Language
chat.content: Set the chat language or automatically translate it to match the user's language. The default language is English.

chat.title: RTL
chat.content: Enable the Right-To-Left (RTL) reading layout for languages that require it.

chat.title: Open automatically
chat.content: Open the chat window automatically when a new message is received.

chat.title: Disable uploads
chat.content: Disable the ability to upload files within the chat.

chat.title: Disable voice messages
chat.content: Disable the ability to send voice messages within the chat.

chat.title: Close chat
chat.content: Allow users to archive a conversation and hide archived conversations from the chat interface.

chat.title: Agents menu
chat.content: Display the agents menu in the dashboard, requiring the user to choose an agent to start a conversation.

chat.title: Messaging channels
chat.content: Allow users to contact you through their preferred messaging apps, including WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, Instagram, etc.

messages.title: Welcome message
messages.content: Send a message to new users when they first visit the website.

messages.title: Follow up message
messages.content: Send a message asking for the user's details if no agents respond within a specified time frame.

messages.title: Follow up email
messages.content: Email template sent to the user after submitting their email through the follow-up message form. Use the following merge fields: {user_name}, {user_email}.

messages.title: Rating Feedback
messages.content: Display a feedback form to rate the conversation when it is archived.

messages.title: Offline Message
messages.content: Notify users when their message is sent outside of office hours or when all agents are offline.

messages.title: Close message
messages.content: Send a message to the user when the agent archives the conversation.

messages.title: Popup message
messages.content: Show a pop-up notification to all users.

messages.title: Privacy message
messages.content: Require the user to accept a privacy message before starting a chat.

admin.title: Collapse Panels
admin.content: Automatically collapse the conversation details panel, along with other panels in the admin area.

admin.title: Hide Conversation Details Panel
admin.content: Automatically hide the conversation details panel in the admin area.

admin.title: Admin Title
admin.content: Set the title for the administration area.

admin.title: Admin Login Logo
admin.content: Replace the brand logo on the admin login page.

admin.title: Admin Icon
admin.content: Replace the top-left brand icon on the admin area and the browser favicon.

admin.title: Admin Login Message
admin.content: Replace the message displayed on the admin login page.

admin.title: Automatically Translate Admin Area
admin.content: Automatically translate the admin area to match the agent profile language or browser language.

admin.title: Do Not Translate Settings Area
admin.content: Enable this option if you do not want to translate the settings area.

admin.title: Automatically Archive Conversations
admin.content: Automatically archive conversations marked as read every 24 hours.

admin.title: Sort Conversations by Date
admin.content: Always sort conversations by date in the admin area.

admin.title: Agent Privileges
admin.content: Define the actions that agents are permitted to perform within the system.

admin.title: Supervisors
admin.content: Define the actions that supervisors are allowed to perform within the system.

admin.title: RTL
admin.content: Enable the Right-To-Left (RTL) reading layout for the admin area, suitable for languages like Arabic and Hebrew.

admin.title: Show profile images
admin.content: Display profile images of agents and users within the conversation view for a more personalized experience.

admin.title: Disable features
admin.content: Turn off any features that are not necessary for your setup to streamline the interface and optimize the system.

admin.title: Notes settings
admin.content: Manage the settings for notes, including visibility and configuration options.

admin.title: Tags
admin.content: Create and manage tags that can be used to categorize and label items across the system.

admin.title: Tags settings
admin.content: Configure and manage the settings related to tags within the system.

admin.title: Add and Manage Departments
admin.content: Add and manage additional support departments for better organization.

admin.title: Department Settings
admin.content: Manage settings for each department.

admin.title: Transcript
admin.content: Configure the settings related to chat transcripts, including formatting and display options.

admin.title: Saved replies
admin.content: Manage and create saved replies that agents can use in the chat editor. These replies can be inserted by typing # followed by the reply name and using \n for line breaks.

admin.title: Primary color
admin.content: Set the primary color for the admin area to align with your brand’s visual identity.

admin.title: Secondary color
admin.content: Set the secondary color for the admin area to complement your primary color.

notifications.title: Sound settings
notifications.content: Configure the sound settings for new messages and conversations.

notifications.title: Online users notification
notifications.content: Notify and play a sound when a new user becomes online.

notifications.title: Away mode
notifications.content: Set the offline status automatically after 10 minutes of inactivity in the admin area.

notifications.title: Desktop notifications
notifications.content: Enable desktop notifications for new messages.

notifications.title: Flash notifications
notifications.content: Enable browser tab notifications for new messages.

notifications.title: Push notifications
notifications.content: Configure push notification settings.

notifications.title: Agent email notifications
notifications.content: Send an email notification to agents when a user replies and the agent is offline. Email notifications are automatically sent for new conversations.

notifications.title: User email notifications
notifications.content: Send an email to users when an agent replies and the user is offline.

notifications.title: Do Not Send Email Notifications to Admins
notifications.content: Prevent email notifications from being sent to admins.

notifications.title: Email Notifications via Cron Job
notifications.content: Enable email notifications through a cron job.

notifications.title: User notification email
notifications.content: Email template for notifications sent to users when agents reply. Includes text, HTML, and merge fields like {conversation_url_parameter}, {recipient_name}, {sender_name}, {sender_profile_image}, {message}, {attachments}.

notifications.title: Agent notification email
notifications.content: Email template for notifications sent to agents when users send new messages. Includes text, HTML, and merge fields like {conversation_link}, {recipient_name}, {sender_name}, {sender_profile_image}, {message}, {attachments}.

notifications.title: Send a User Email Notification
notifications.content: Send an email notification to a provided email address.

notifications.title: Send an Agent Email Notification
notifications.content: Send an email notification to a provided email address.

notifications.title: Email signature
notifications.content: Set the default email signature that will be appended to automated emails and direct emails.

notifications.title: Email header
notifications.content: Set the default email header that will be prepended to automated emails and direct emails.

notifications.title: Text message notifications
notifications.content: Enter your Twilio account details to enable text message notifications.

notifications.title: Send a User SMS Notification
notifications.content: Send a text message to the provided phone number.

notifications.title: Send an Agent SMS Notification
notifications.content: Send a text message to the provided phone number.

notifications.title: Notifications Icon
notifications.content: Set the default notifications icon. The icon will be used as the profile image if the user does not have one.

users.title: Require Registration
users.content: Require the user to register or log in before starting a chat. Ensure the password field is included if enabling login functionality.

users.title: Disable Registration During Office Hours
users.content: Allow registration only outside of scheduled office hours.

users.title: Disable Registration if Agents Are Online
users.content: Allow registration only when all agents are offline.

users.title: Registration Link
users.content: Redirect users to a custom registration link instead of showing the registration form.

users.title: Login Verification URL
users.content: Send login details to a specified URL and allow access only if the response is positive.

users.title: Registration Form
users.content: User registration form details.

users.title: Login form
users.content: User login form details.

users.title: Registration fields
users.content: Select which fields to include in the registration form. The 'name' field is included by default.

users.title: Custom fields
users.content: Add custom fields to the user profile details.

users.title: Include Custom Fields
users.content: Include custom fields in the registration form.

users.title: User Details in Success Message
users.content: Include the user's details in the success message after registration.

users.title: Email Verification (OTP)
users.content: Enable email verification with OTP (One-Time Password).

users.title: Email Verification Email
users.content: Email template for the verification email. Include the {code} merge field for the OTP code.

users.title: Register All Visitors
users.content: Automatically register all visitors. If disabled, only visitors who start a chat will be registered.

users.title: Envato Purchase Code Validation
users.content: Validate Envato purchase codes for registration.

users.title: Single phone country code
users.content: Enforce the use of a single phone country code for registration.

users.title: Visitor Name Prefix
users.content: Change the prefix for the visitor's name. Default is 'User'.

users.title: Visitor Default Name
users.content: Set the default username to use in bot messages and emails when no name is provided.

users.title: Full Visitor Details
users.content: Save additional information such as the user's country and language for visitors.

users.title: Display User's Profile Image
users.content: Show the user's profile image within the chat.

users.title: Hide Agent's Profile Image
users.content: Hide the agent's profile image within the chat.

users.title: Show Sender's Name
users.content: Show the sender's name in each message.

users.title: Bot Name
users.content: Change the default chat bot name. Default is 'Bot'.

users.title: Bot Profile Image
users.content: Set a profile image for the chat bot.

users.title: Delete Leads
users.content: Delete all leads and associated messages and conversations.

users.title: Import Users
users.content: Import users from a CSV file.

design.title: Primary color
design.content: Set the primary color of the chat widget.

design.title: Secondary color
design.content: Set the secondary color of the chat widget.

design.title: Tertiary color
design.content: Set the tertiary color of the chat widget.

design.title: Chat position
design.content: Set the position of the chat widget.

design.title: Header title
design.content: Change the title text in the header area of the chat widget. This text will be replaced by the agent's name once the first reply is sent.

design.title: Header message
design.content: Change the message text in the header area of the chat widget. This text will be replaced by the agent headline once the first reply is sent.

design.title: Display user name in header
design.content: Replace the header title with the user's first name and last name when available.

design.title: Header brand image
design.content: Display a brand image in the header area. This only applies for the 'brand' header type.

design.title: Header background image
design.content: Apply a custom background image for the header area.

design.title: Chat button icon
design.content: Change the chat button image with a custom one.

design.title: Built-in chat button icons
design.content: Change the chat button image with a custom one.

design.title: Chat background
design.content: Choose a background texture for the chat header and conversation area.

design.title: Chat button offset
design.content: Adjust the chat button position. Values are in px.

miscellaneous.title: Webhooks
miscellaneous.content: Webhooks send information in the background to a URL you define when certain events occur.

miscellaneous.title: Envato Purchase Code
miscellaneous.content: Enter your Envato Purchase Code to enable automatic updates and unlock additional features.

miscellaneous.title: Enable Automatic Updates
miscellaneous.content: Automatically check and install updates. Requires a valid Envato Purchase Code and app license keys.

miscellaneous.title: Pusher Integration
miscellaneous.content: Enhance chat performance using Pusher and WebSockets to eliminate slow AJAX/HTTP real-time requests.

miscellaneous.title: Newsletter Integration
miscellaneous.content: Automatically subscribe users to your chosen newsletter service when they provide their email address.

miscellaneous.title: Office Hours Schedule
miscellaneous.content: Define the office hours for when agents are shown as available. These hours are also used in other settings relying on office availability.

miscellaneous.title: UTC Offset
miscellaneous.content: Set the UTC offset for your office hours. This will automatically be calculated when you click the input field if left empty.

miscellaneous.title: Queue Management
miscellaneous.content: Distribute conversations among agents proportionally and notify users of their position in the queue.

miscellaneous.title: Routing Settings
miscellaneous.content: Distribute conversations between agents and prevent agents from viewing other agents' conversations.

miscellaneous.title: Hide Other Agents' Conversations
miscellaneous.content: Prevent agents from viewing conversations assigned to other agents. This setting is enabled if routing or queue management is active.

miscellaneous.title: Rich Messages
miscellaneous.content: Create rich messages with HTML code to be used in chat conversations. These messages are rendered automatically in the chat.

miscellaneous.title: Cookie Domain
miscellaneous.content: Set the main domain for chat sharing between subdomains. Leave blank if unsure, as entering an incorrect value will break the chat functionality.

miscellaneous.title: Performance Optimization
miscellaneous.content: Disable unnecessary features to improve chat performance.

miscellaneous.title: Amazon S3 Integration
miscellaneous.content: Upload attachments directly to Amazon S3 for better storage management.

miscellaneous.title: Enable Logs
miscellaneous.content: Enable logging of agent activity for auditing purposes.

miscellaneous.title: System Requirements
miscellaneous.content: Check if your server meets all necessary requirements for optimal performance.

miscellaneous.title: IP Blocking
miscellaneous.content: Block chat access by listing IPs that are not allowed to access the chat system.

miscellaneous.title: Support Board Path
miscellaneous.content: Get the Support Board path for your server.

miscellaneous.title: Installation URL
miscellaneous.content: Retrieve your Support Board installation URL.

miscellaneous.title: Export Settings
miscellaneous.content: Export all current settings to a file.

miscellaneous.title: Import Settings
miscellaneous.content: Import settings from a previously exported file.

articles.title: Display in dashboard
articles.content: Show the articles panel on the chat dashboard.

articles.title: Display categories
articles.content: Show the categories instead of the articles list.

articles.title: Panel title
articles.content: Set the articles panel title. Default is 'Help Center'.

articles.title: Articles button link
articles.content: Customize the link for the 'All articles' button.

articles.title: Articles page URL
articles.content: Enter the URL of the articles page.

articles.title: URL rewrite
articles.content: Change the default URLs with user-friendly URLs.
